entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove OPT_NO_FTS and OPT_NO_LTS from Installers #38077
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Update project templates to use DateOnly instead of DateTime where appropriate #38075
  • VS 2022 Preview 7, Asp.net 6, New Blazor Server Project with Periods in Project Name Fails to Build #38074
  • VS2022 RC2 Building Blazor error reporting not working well #38072
  • Blazor wasm size reduction #38071
  • VS2022 RC3 Blazor errors in _Imports.razor repeated 100 times #38070
  • VS2022 RC3 Blazor compilation errors showing only in generated .razor.g.cs files and not in my code #38069
  • Startup improvement: connectionclosehttps #38067
  • Startup regression: connectionclosehttps, mapaction, mvc #38066
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #38065
  • New Item Templates and Implicit Global Usings #38063
    Backlog
  • Using UsePathBase with querystring from root throws exception #38058
  • optional renderfragment cause compiler error RZ9996 #38056
  • Not posible to get RequestTimedOut from Kestrel middleware. #38053
  • 'dotnet watch run' for a console app keeps restarting after one modification #38064
  • Startup improvement: mapaction #38052
  • Change visibility of IRemoteAuthenticationPathsProvider in Blazor WebAssembly to implement custom OAuth2 #38048
  • Add configuration option to `RedisCache` to allow read-only access #38046
    Backlog

Closed

  • NewtonsoftJsonInputFormatter: Deserialize error handling #37977
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Feature Request] Better support Dependency Inversion with SignalR Core #38007
  • Need to document that stopPropagation refers to Blazor's delegated events, not native DOM events #30199
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Perf regression: caching, mapaction, single_query #37951
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #38050
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plaintext #38051
  • Feature request: Allow `DataProtection` API to protect some data using a specific key #38055
  • Blazor Server Page Refresh/Scroll ? #38057
  • ReactRedux project template npm install EJSONPARSE failure #37287
    5.0.x
  • [release/5.0] Invalid json in package.json for the reactredux template #37520
    5.0.x
  • Can't launch Blazor WebAssembly sample apps from VS within this repo code #37514
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Found malformed component comment in Blazor WebAssembly app with prerendering #38049
  • Can not use BaseIntermediateOutputPath with v5.0.8 #37958
  • How to authorize SignalR Hub for both Identity Role OR JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme? #38039
  • Perf regression: caching #37996
  • AuthTest.AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized() #33657
    6.0-docs-infra

PullRequests

Created

  • Use file scoped namespaces #38076
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Components E2E Test Execution Instructions #38073
    Docs, area-blazor
  • Guard access failed calls #38068
    area-identity
  • Add WebApi-CSharp Template Toggle Description (#37367) #38062
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.x
  • Make RoleStore protected virtual #38061
    area-identity
  • Use the RawConnectionId for HttpSys #38059
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Improve exception messages for missing auth services #38045
    area-security

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `a575301` to `ffdec25` #37983
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Modify Mvc.Analyzer tests to use Roslyn test infrastructure #38010
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • [main] Special case X.Y.1 in Directory.Build.targets.in #38047
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Update Chrome and Selenium Versions #38024
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [SPA] Update NPM dependencies #37739
    area-mvc, tell-mode, 5.0.13
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #38027
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Unquarantine `AuthorizeViewCases_RequirePolicy_Authorized` #37717
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37881
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.22
  • [release/5.0] Only dispose WindowsIdentity in LongPolling #37818
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 5.0.13
  • Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37879
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.13
  • [release/5.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `3b49be0` to `16f637f` #37980
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.13

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #38042
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 2.1.31
  • [release/3.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37969
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 3.1.22
  • [release/5.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37968
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 5.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37967
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.1
  • Add attributes to SignalR source generator #38025
    area-signalr, api-suggestion
  • Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37966
    area-runtime
  • Fix groupIdentity in protobuf template #37919
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc
  • [release/6.0] Use frozen lockfiles with Yarn #37848
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • [release/6.0] Add Server2022 to helix matrix & quarantine jobs #37918
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.1
  • Fix for remember browser #38040
    area-identity
